channel.title: Paths on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Paths on ZooBerry

item.title: Genkicoll's ZT1 Paths for ZT2 Pack
item.description: A selection of genkicoll’s wonderful paths that she has made for ZT1, replicated with permission for use in ZT2. Enjoy wooden, sandstone, shadowstone and other paths in your zoos!

item.title: Leafy Path
item.description: A path covered in newly fallen leaves, featuring leaf decorations along the curb as well. Perfect for a walk through temperate forests!

item.title: Desert Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Desert Theme from African Adventure.

item.title: Endangered Species Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Endangered Theme from Endangered Species.

item.title: Extinct Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Extinct Theme from Extinct Animals.

item.title: Jungle Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Jungle Theme from base Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: Safari Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Safari Theme from base Zoo Tycoon 2.

item.title: Tundra Themed Elevated Path
item.description: Part of a set of elevated paths made to match the vanilla game’s building themes, in this case the Tundra Theme from official bonus downloads.

item.title: Tree Elevated Path Pack
item.description: This pack contains 9 elevated paths, each made to resemble a tree from a different biome.

item.title: Colored Path Pack
item.description: This pack contains 14 wonderful colors of path to add a delightful touch to your zoo.

item.title: Zoomania Path
item.description: This path was designed for the ZooMania 100 Member Celebration Party.
